teaser: A joke about our neighbors to the north, from acclaimed author – and Canadian Studies scholar – Margaret Atwood. She returns later in the show to tell us about her newest book, “MaddAddam.”
title: “Canadian Sex” – Margaret Atwood

description: A joke about our neighbors to the north, from acclaimed author – and Canadian Studies scholar – Margaret Atwood. She returns later in the show to tell us about her newest book, “MaddAddam.”
contentencoded:
A joke about our neighbors to the north, from acclaimed author – and Canadian Studies scholar – Margaret Atwood.


She returns later in the show to tell us about her newest book, “MaddAddam.”
